author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new scenario to evaluate the August 2023 HGCal Test Beam

#### PR validation:

Checked using dumping geometry for fireworks and with overlap checks

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-TB71 Add a new scenario to evaluate the August 2023 HGCal Test Beam
